emailTemplate:usMarket.description: Generate a US-market version of the trading hours email template
emailTemplate:usMarket.prompt: Generate a new HTML email using the layout and style of 'trading-hours-adjustment-eu-es.html'. Update the headline to 'Trading Schedule Notice – US Markets', switch times to EST, and change language to English.

emailTemplate:newLanguageVersion.description: Generate a translated copy of an existing email template
emailTemplate:newLanguageVersion.prompt: Translate the HTML email in 'trading-hours-adjustment-eu-es.html' into French, keeping the layout and formatting the same. Only update text content.

component:reactButton.description: Generate a custom React Button component following our design system
component:reactButton.prompt: Create a reusable React Button component using Tailwind CSS. Props should allow color variants (primary, secondary), disabled state, and a loading spinner. Follow the pattern used in 'components/ui/Button.tsx'.

apiClient:resourceFetcher.description: Generate a typed API fetch function with error handling
apiClient:resourceFetcher.prompt: Create a TypeScript fetch function to retrieve project data from '/api/projects'. Use types from 'types/api.ts' and include error handling with 'handleApiError'.

utils:dateFormatter.description: Generate a standard date formatter for localized emails
utils:dateFormatter.prompt: Write a TypeScript utility function to format a date into 'Monday, June 24 – 2:00 PM EST'. Localize the output based on a given timezone and language.
